channel.title: "blood diamond cutter" (prim sword) (second model)
channel.description: i know 1 side is poly over kill but its only my second model and i didn't want to mess with it because didn't want to ruin it plus here is the picture it was based off [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2dhs2dw.png[/img] and here are wire-frames of good side and stuffed up side [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2rm3zms.jpg[/img] IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/e5fas5.jpg[/IMG] and here is render [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2w3e1cj.jpg[/img] constructive criticism only please. credit- 30% to Irish dragon357 for picture of sword, 70% to me for modeling it.

item.title: "blood diamond cutter" (prim sword) (second model)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

Try not making a bunch of different parts to you model, because when you move on to a more advanced program you’re gunna have problems rendering.

Read full topic

item.title: "blood diamond cutter" (prim sword) (second model)
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“migetman40, post:8, topic:378389”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=474258.msg3467941#msg3467941 date=1295069650]

looks good, just needa make the hilt bigger… the part where you hold it and it’d look better nice work

i was thinking that but it is attached to a part of the blade so it warps the blade if i try…

try selecting the hnd part and just delete it if that doesnt work try using the brush took to get the iles and delete then make it again
[/quote]
i fixed the handle sort of but i cant be stuffed uploading then posting, but thanks for the help =)[/quote]

anytime

Read full topic

item.title: "blood diamond cutter" (prim sword) (second model)
item.dc:creator: @migetman40 migetman40
item.description:
@migetman40 wrote:

[quote=“sjustin1996, post:3, topic:378389”]Yeah, I’m pretty sure we all understand it doesn’t have a name if we care that it doesn’t. Aside from that, I agree. Nice idea, not the best work, but I’ll say, it’s good for a second model.

EDIT: Well, that kind of depends on how much time it took. If this took you a couple days then this is horrible work. If it took like 30 minutes then sure I guess.[/quote]

it only took about 40 mins and i made some adjustments plus named it (blood diamond cutter) and added some stuff im uploading now =)

Read full topic

item.title: "blood diamond cutter" (prim sword) (second model)
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

Yeah, I’m pretty sure we all understand it doesn’t have a name if we care that it doesn’t. Aside from that, I agree. Nice idea, not the best work, but I’ll say, it’s good for a second model.

EDIT: Well, that kind of depends on how much time it took. If this took you a couple days then this is horrible work. If it took like 30 minutes then sure I guess.

Read full topic

Looks ok, rather basic though. Needs some more design.
